variable.name: FSASDATE
variable.description: Date of event as SAS date value

variable.name: FORM
variable.description: DCCT form number

variable.name: HCCOMDAT
variable.description: Date form was completed

variable.name: HCLEARN
variable.description: Date DCCT clinic learned of Intercurrent Event

variable.name: DUPOK
variable.description: NOTE: DCC reports that this variable was used for internal data management and should be ignored by analysts.

variable.name: HCBGMEAS
variable.description: Blood glucose before treatment: measurement value

variable.name: HCREDMSR
variable.description: Blood glucose after treatment: measurement value

variable.name: HCRANDOM
variable.description: Has patient been randomized

variable.name: HCUNCRTN
variable.description: Date of event uncertain

variable.name: HCHOWLRN
variable.description: How clinic learned of event
variable.value: CLINIC RECOGNIZED EVENT AND INFORMED PATIENT

variable.name: HCSLPWAK
variable.description: Episode occurred while patient was asleep or awake

variable.name: HCLCONSC
variable.description: Clinical manifestation of intercurrent hypoglycemic event: loss of consciousness

variable.name: HCSEIZ
variable.description: Clinical manifestation of intercurrent hypoglycemic event: seizure

variable.name: HCSPSEIZ
variable.description: Clinical manifestation of intercurrent hypoglycemic event: suspected seizure

variable.name: HCDIFAWK
variable.description: Clinical manifestation of intercurrent hypoglycemic event: difficulty in awakening

variable.name: HCIRRAT
variable.description: Clinical manifestation of intercurrent hypoglycemic event: irrational behavior

variable.name: HCUNCTRL
variable.description: Clinical manifestation of intercurrent hypoglycemic event: uncontrollable behavior

variable.name: HCCONFUS
variable.description: Clinical manifestation of intercurrent hypoglycemic event: confusion

variable.name: HCMEMLSS
variable.description: Clinical manifestation of intercurrent hypoglycemic event: memory loss

variable.name: HCBGBEF
variable.description: Blood glucose: measured before treatment

variable.name: HCBEFWHO
variable.description: Blood glucose: who measured BG before treatment

variable.name: HCBGUNKN
variable.description: Blood glucose - measured before treatment: measured value unknown

variable.name: HCBGMONT
variable.description: Blood glucose - measured before treatment: which method was used

variable.name: HCBGAFT
variable.description: Blood glucose: measured after treatment

variable.name: HCAFTWHO
variable.description: Blood glucose: who measured BG after treatment

variable.name: HCUNKNWN
variable.description: Blood glucose: measured value unknown

variable.name: HCBGMETH
variable.description: Blood glucose - measured after treatment: which method was used

variable.name: HCREVRS
variable.description: Symptoms (of hypoglycemic event) reversed without treatment

variable.name: HCTRSLF
variable.description: Patient treated him/herself

variable.name: HCRCVAST
variable.description: Patient received assistance

variable.name: HCSLFTRT
variable.description: Patient was capable of self treatment

variable.name: HCNOTRT
variable.description: Patient was incapable of treating him/herself

variable.name: HCHOSPTL
variable.description: Patient was hospitalized

variable.name: HCIVGLUC
variable.description: Patient was given intravenous glucose treatment

variable.name: HCGLUCGO
variable.description: Patient was given glucagon treatment

variable.name: HCORLCAR
variable.description: Patient was given oral carbohydrates treatment

variable.name: HCOTHER
variable.description: Other treatment was administered

variable.name: HCASOCEV
variable.description: Associated event(s) occured with hypoglycemic event

variable.name: HCDEATH
variable.description: Associated event: death

variable.name: HCNEUDAM
variable.description: Associated event: irreversible neurological damage

variable.name: HCMI
variable.description: Associated event: myocardial infarction

variable.name: HCSTROKE
variable.description: Associated event: stroke occurred

variable.name: HCHOSINJ
variable.description: Associated event: injury requiring hospitalization

variable.name: HCINJOTR
variable.description: Associated event: injury to another person

variable.name: HCPROPDM
variable.description: Associated event: property damage

variable.name: HCTRAFIC
variable.description: Associated event: traffic violation

variable.name: HCWHTTRT
variable.description: Patient's treatment group at time of hypoglycemic event

variable.name: HCEXPER
variable.description: If patient was in experimental treatment group, did patient use MDI, pump, or both

variable.name: HCPMPMAL
variable.description: If patient used insulin pump, is a pump malfunction suspected to be the cause of the hypoglycemic event

variable.name: MASK_PAT
variable.description: Patient ID number
